property.name: jdk.version.class
property.description: JDK version of generated class files

target.name: help
target.description: Prints POI's Ant usage help
target.echo: - Execute "ant -projecthelp" to view a listing of the main build targets. - Execute "ant help-properties" to view a listing of some properties controlling the build process.

target.name: help-properties
target.description: Prints a listing of build controlling properties
target.echo:
The following properties control the build process:
-Ddisconnected="true": Do not execute any targets that require an online connection to the Internet. -Dtestcase=org.apache.poi.xxx.xxx : for the single-test target, specify the test to run -Dfilename=xxxx.xls : for the command line task targets, specify the file to run against
WARNING: This list is not exhaustive.

target.name: fetch-jars
target.description: Fetches needed JAR files from the Internet

target.name: fetch-ooxml-xsds
target.description: Fetches needed OOXML xsd files from the Internet

target.name: compile-ooxml-xsds
target.description: Unpacks the OOXML xsd files, and compiles them into XmlBeans

target.name: compile
target.description: Compiles the POI main classes, scratchpad, contrib, and examples

target.name: compile-version
target.description: Compiles the version class

target.name: test
target.description: Tests main, contrib, scratchpad and ooxml

target.name: test-fail
target.description: run tests that are known to fail

target.name: single-test
target.description: Runs a single test case specified with -Dtestcase=classname

echo.message: Please use -Dtestcase=org.your.testcase to run a single test

target.name: single-scratchpad-test
target.description: Runs a single test case specified with -Dtestcase=classname

target.name: single-test-ooxml
target.description: Runs a single ooxml test case specified with -Dtestcase=classname

target.name: -check-forrest-installed
target.echo: Please install Apache Forrest (see <http://xml.apache.org/forrest/index.html>) and set the FORREST_HOME environment variable!

target.name: docs
target.description: Builds the POI website

target.name: reports
target.depends: -check-reports, fail-unless-jdepend-is-available, test-ignore-failures, junitreport, jdepend, javadocs, clover.html
target.description: Creates various reports and the API documentation

target.name: junitreport
target.description: Produces a report of the JUnit test results

target.name: javadocs
target.description: Generates the API documentation

javadoc.author: true
javadoc.bottom: Copyright ${tstamp.year} The Apache Software Foundation or its licensors, as applicable.

target.name: site
target.description: Generates POI's website's contents

target.name: maven-poms
target.description: Builds the POM files for a maven distribution, and copies these and the jars to the appropriate locations

target.name: maven-ooxml-dependencies
target.description: Builds the POM files for the compiled XmlBeans generated from the Ecma supplied xsds

target.name: jar
target.description: Creates jar files for distribution

target.name: jar-examples
target.description: Creates a jar file of the examples, in case people want to use them as-is

target.name: dist
target.description: Creates the entire distribution into build/dist, from scratch

target.name: clean-dist
target.description: Cleans the build directory then creates a distribution

target.name: dtd
target.description: Generates the Ant document type definition (DTD)

target.name: fail-jdepend
target.echo: JDepend is not available. You must download JDepend from <http://www.clarkware.com/software/JDepend.html> and include the JAR file in your classpath.

target.name: jdepend
target.description: Runs jdepend to produce a report about package dependencies

target.name: -require-filename
target.description: Ensure -Dfilename=... was given

fail.message: A filename must be supplied with -Dfilename=, eg -Dfilename=test.xls

target.name: POIFSViewer
target.description: Runs poifs.dev.POIFSViewer against the supplied file

target.name: OOXMLLister
target.description: Runs dev.OOXMLLister against the supplied file

target.name: BiffViewer
target.description: Runs hssf.dev.BiffViewer against the supplied file
